metadata.title: CVE-2023-52646 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: aio:fix mremap after fork null-deref Commit e4a0d3e720e7 ("aio: Make itpossible to remap aio ring") introduced a null-deref if mremap is called onan old aio mapping after fork as mm->ioctx_table will be set to NULL.[jmoyer@redhat.com: fix 80 column issue]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
